ygData.subject: Re: Kobold vs Elder Tier'Dal
ygData.msgSnippet: Because it is I hate to break the news to you, but you are incorrect. I speak all race languages plus, Elder Elvish, Old Erudian, Elder Teir dal, and Combine,
ygData.messageBody:
Because it is I hate to break the news to you, but you are incorrect. I speak all race languages plus, Elder Elvish, Old Erudian, Elder Teir'dal, and Combine, all to excellent. In the language choice it reads the above mentioned languages but when
you look at your skill list Elder Teir'dal is Kobold and Combine is Giant Tounge, I do not know about the remaining languages (Dragon, Old Dragon, and Thieve's Cant) out there but hopefully I will find out. BTW The rest of the languages match up
with the same name.

kalekona@... wrote:

> From: <kalekona@...>
>
> I don't know why people insist that Elder Tier'Dal is
> Kolbold when Tier'Dal is the Dark Elf Race.....Not to
> mention that there is a distinctly seperate language.
